Method.name: DisplayToLogical
Method.Description:
Converts the input value %val, which represents a time value, into a logical time value (number of seconds since midnight).

Returns the value of the input string %val as a logical time value (number of seconds since midnight).

Method.name: LogicalToDisplay
Method.Description: Converts the value of <var>%val</var>, which is a logical time value (number of seconds since midnight), into a display string. The formatting is based on the value of the <var>FORMAT</var> parameter. Returns the formatted value of <var>%val</var>.
Method.Implementation: n i,len,sep k %code s %code=0 s %codemode=$$$cMETHCODEMODEEXPRESSION s %code="$s(%val="""":"""",1:$zt(%val,2))" QUIT $$$OK
